basics.name: John Moxon
basics.label: Technology Leader
basics.summary: John is a experienced senior technical leader who bridges the gap between technology and business acumen. With a proven track record of deliving best-in-class product customers love

work.summary: Managing an annual budget between $4-6M, I was tasked with delivering enterprise systems and applications to enable staff and customers to trade in foreign currency products.  As part of the brand's senior leadership team I helped define and implement the groups retail and online strategy.
highlights: Drove 111% Currency Card revenue increase through systematic indentification and removal user friction points
Reduced annual compliance spend by 30%
Improved login success rates by over 10%
Implemented high-availabilty failover retail servers ensuring 99.999% uptime during trading hours
Negotiated and coordinated external vendors to integrate Adyen payment gateway including card stored payment details. This is expected to increase overseas payment success by upto 30%

work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scores™ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Successfully lead multiple diciplines across internal and exteral teams to deliver an industry first digital wallet solution sold in over 1000 retail stores in Australia with a 75k active user base growing 30% year on year.

Implemented sales support desk team and enabled with online chat, reduced support resolution time from 2-5 days to under 4mins.  This has lead to network-wide adoption and a turnover increase of over 110%
Defined, implemented and deployed operational

work.summary: Lead a multi-disciplinary agile digital delivery team developing Drupal aplications for a family of 6 niche travel brands.
highlights: Lead a multi-disciplinary team of 14 drupal developers, Business Analysts, Scrum masters and conversion rate optimisation analysts
Implemented agile scrum methodologies and gained widescale adoption and acceptance amongst marketing, UX and
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores
Implemented standardised provisioned development environments, cutting the ramp-up speed for new hires from 2 weeks to 2 days.
Lead front-end developer for the group's internal CRM and lead distribution system. Routing over 2500 enquiries a day across over 800 retail stores and over 6000 staff.
